General.Name: ZECON Bhd
General.Description: Zecon Berhad engages in the foundation engineering, civil engineering, building contracting, and related activities primarily in Malaysia. The company operates through Construction, Property Development, Service Concession, Property Holding, and Others segments. It is also involved in the piling works; construction, operation, and maintenance of hospital; and the provision of water infrastructure related services. In addition, the company engages in the development, construction, investment, management, and sale of properties; management, maintenance, and rental of machineries, motor vehicles, and hardware of various descriptions; construction, housing development, and other related activities; and construction of medium and low-cost houses. Further, it provides sand dredging, earthworks, and material transportation services; hospital concession services; computer, engineering, landscape care, and maintenance services; hotel management and consultancy services; operates car parking and other parking facilities; and property investment and construction; and supplies electrical or electric equipment and services. Zecon Berhad was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Kuching, Malaysia.
